Detailed Description

Communication Area for ft-Device.
Examples:

example.c.

Field Documentation

unsigned char _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::IRKeys

IR-Receiver input code.

Base+0x0E: | 0 | 0 | 0 | C | T | T | T | T C = Code: 0 = Code 1 active, 1 = Code 2 active TTTT = Keycode 0..11 Arangement of keys on Transmitter 1 8 2 7 3 10 4 9 5 11 6 Taste 1 = M3 right Taste 2 = M3 left Taste 3 = Speed. M1 Taste 4 = Speed. M2 Taste 5 = Speed. M3 Taste 6 = Code 2 Taste 7 = M1 backward Taste 8 = M1 forward Taste 9 = M2 left Taste 10 = M2 right Taste 11 = Code 1

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::AX

Analoginput of main module.

8x 16 Bit, Range 0..1023, L:H Format (intel) ) Base+0x10..0x11: AX (Master Modul)

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::AY

Analoginput of main module.

8x 16 Bit, Range 0..1023, L:H Format (intel) ) Base+0x12..0x13: AY (Master Modul)

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::A1

Analoginput of main module.

8x 16 Bit, Range 0..1023, L:H Format (intel) ) Base+0x14..0x15: A1 (Master Modul)

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::A2

Analoginput of main module.

8x 16 Bit, Range 0..1023, L:H Format (intel) ) Base+0x16..0x17: A2 (Master Modul)

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::AZ

Analoginput of main module.

8x 16 Bit, Range 0..1023, L:H Format (intel) ) Base+0x18..0x19: AZ (Master Modul, vom SLAVE-Modul-BUS)

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::AV

Analoginput of main module.

8x 16 Bit, Range 0..1023, L:H Format (intel) ) Base+0x1A..0x1B: AV (Versorgungsspannung Master Modul)

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::D1

Analoginput of main module.

8x 16 Bit, Range 0..1023, L:H Format (intel) ) Base+0x1C..0x1D: D1 (Abstandssensor 1)

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::D2

Analoginput of main module.

8x 16 Bit, Range 0..1023, L:H Format (intel) ) Base+0x1E..0x1F: D2 (Abstandssensor 2)

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::AXS1

Analoginput of slave module 1.

Base+0x20..0x21: AX (Slave 1 Modul)

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::AXS2

Analoginput of slave module 1.

Base+0x22..0x23: AX (Slave 2 Modul)

Analoginput of slave module 1.

Base+0x24..0x25: AX (Slave 3 Modul)

Detection limit for distance sensor 1 ( to generate digital from analog input ).

Base+0x26..0x27: DS1

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::DS2

Detection limit for distance sensor 2 ( to generate digital from analog input ).

Base+0x28..0x29: DS2

unsigned char _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::M_Main

unsigned char _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::MES_Main

Outputs of the main module ( energy saver mode ).

1 = energy saver mode, 0 = operational, PowerUp = 1 Base+0x48: | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | M4 | M3 | M2 | M1 |

unsigned char _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::TransferAktiv

Base+0xE2.

0 = Transfer Area closed 1 = Transfer Area is working (Library Thread is running)

Referenced by CloseFtDevice(), GetFtUsbDeviceHandle(), IsFtTransferActiv(), OpenFtCommDevice(), and StopFtTransferArea().

unsigned char _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::BusModules

I/O Extension modules connected.

Base+0xE6: | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | S2 | S1 | S0 | S2..S0 = Number of connected I/O Extension Modules

Referenced by OpenFtCommDevice().

unsigned char _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::ChangeEg

Change Bytes.

1 = EG (Master or Slave 1..3) have changed The Application must read and change this byte to "0" Base+0xF0:

unsigned char _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::ChangeAn

1 = Analog Inputs (Master AX, AY, A1, A2, AV, AZ or Extension 1..3 AX,AY,AV)

or RfPower, RfError have changed The Application must read and change this byte to "0" Base+0xF1:

unsigned char _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::ChangeIr

1 = Infrared Input (Robo-IF) or RfStatus have changed

The Application must read and change this byte to "0" Base+0xF2:

unsigned char _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::rsvd17[10]

Reserved.

Base+0x1A6..0x1AF

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::RfStatus

1 = RfError (0x1B4..0x1B5) is > 25. We think, Rf connection (only Onlinemodus) is lost

Base+0x1B0..0x1B1

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::RfPower

Signal Power of the RF Signal entering the RF input (only Onlinemodus, 7 bit, 0..127).

Base+0x1B2..0x1B3

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::RfError

Rf-Error Count (0..250).

Base+0x1B4..0x1B5

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::MsgNumInBuffer

Number of Messages inside the Buffer.

Base+0x1B6..0x1B7

unsigned short _FT_TRANSFER_AREA::RfModulNr

Number of Interface-RF-Modul if installed or "-1" if not installed.

Base+0x1B8..0x1B9
